item.title: Garett Jones on the private return to AGI
item.description:
Garett Jones on Twitter

“The private return to AGI will plausibly be as low as the private return to HGI: About 1% more output per IQ point. So an IQ 400 AGI can do about 20X of an average person. If you’re looking for god-tier AGI, that ain’t it.”

URL: https://twitter.com/GarettJones/status/1629151604749307905

item.title: How to Get an AI to Lie to You in Three Simple Steps
item.description:
By now, everyone knows that ChatGPT and related Large Language Models can lie (or hallucinate, or whatever term you like), but we are often fooled by the subtly of the lies that they tell. In fact, these AIs lie so well that I keep getting taken in myself. For example, I spent too long this week trying to understand how ChatGPT was able to analyze a rece…

URL: https://oneusefulthing.substack.com/p/how-to-get-an-ai-to-lie-to-you-in?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web
